name: nativescript-admob
description: Make money with your app by using Google's AdMob ads.

scripts.demo.android.release: echo '*** Replace MY_PASSWORD ***' && cd ../demo && tns build android --release --for-device --key-store-path ../../xservices.keystore --key-store-password MY_PASSWORD --key-store-alias xservices --key-store-alias-password MY_PASSWORD && adb install ../demo/platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk
scripts.generate-typings.ios: cd ../demo && TNS_DEBUG_METADATA_PATH="$(pwd)/metadata" tns build ios && TNS_TYPESCRIPT_DECLARATIONS_PATH="$(pwd)/typings" tns build ios && echo 'Now look for your library typings in ../demo/typings. Afterwards, remove that folder, and the (intermediate) metadata-* folders.'
